content.title: 4M Stretch Goal Unlocked! Next: Get $334 Ink at 6M, $999 Purifier at 8.5M!
content.creator:
xTool
March 24, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
  We are pleased to announce that we have reached the $4 million stretch goal for the xTool Apparel Printer. As a result, each backer will receive a 100-meter film roll, 1 kg of baking powder, and a printer cleaning kit, in addition to the $294 worth of ink and film unlocked at the $2 million goal.
  But the excitement doesn't stop here! We have even more amazing stretch goals lined up:
  $6 Million Goal: Unlock this, and we'll be giving away 5 bottles of Free Ink, valued at $334!
  $8.5 Million Goal: Reach this, and you'll receive a $999 Air Purifier!
  If we unlock all the stretch goals, you'll be receiving over $1800+ in total gifts!
  We sincerely appreciate your continued support and trust. Let's work together to unlock all the remaining stretch goals!
  Thank you,
The xTool Team

content.title: Did you know that most businesses may actually qualify for tax exemption?
content.creator:
xTool
March 18, 2025
content.content:
We‚Äôve received many inquiries about ‚Äúwhat documents are needed for tax-exempt purchases‚Äù. In fact, businesses or organizations‚Äîwhether in the EU, USA, or Canada‚Äîmay qualify for reduced or even 0% tax simply by registering for the proper tax ID or providing proof of exemption. Below is a quick summary of key documentations in major regions, helping you prepare more efficiently and save on costs.
    United States: Sales & Use Tax Exemption
Resale Certificate
Businesses purchasing goods for resale can present a valid seller‚Äôs permit and complete state-specific or streamlined exemption forms (e.g., CDTFA-230 or SSTGB Form F0003).
  Tax-Exempt Organizations
501(c)(3) nonprofits, schools, universities, government agencies, or tribal entities must provide documentation verifying their tax-exempt status (e.g., an IRS determination letter, state exemption certificate, or official purchase order).
  EU Region: EU VAT Exemption
Valid EU VAT ID or Local Business Registration Number
Provide a valid EU VAT number (verified via the EU VIES system) or a local business registration number (e.g., SIRET, NIF) accepted in certain jurisdictions.
In many cases, an EU VAT ID is required for cross-border B2B transactions, while some member states may allow their local tax or business IDs for domestic purchases.
Other Tax-Exempt Organizations
Nonprofits, NGOs, educational institutions, or governmental bodies may be eligible to furnish recognized proof of tax-exempt status (such as official registration documents or tax-exempt certificates) to potentially enjoy 0% VAT, subject to local regulations.
  Canada: GST/HST/PST Relief
Registered Charities (BN) / Public Service Bodies
Submit relevant certificates to apply for tax exemption or reduction, such as a charity registration number, government bodies, schools, or universities typically need to provide official purchase orders or exemption documentation.
First Nations Purchasers
Possess recognized identification from the government (e.g., Indian band or band-empowered entity) to qualify for specific 0% tax rates or exemptions.
        Disclaimer
The above information is provided for general reference only and does not constitute legal or tax advice. Tax rates, regulations, and eligibility criteria may vary or change across countries (and within states or provinces). If you have questions, please consult a local tax advisor or the official tax authority to ensure compliance and obtain accurate details on tax exemptions.
If you or your organization meet any of the above criteria, we recommend verifying your eligibility and registering for a tax ID or applying for a tax-exempt certificate with the relevant authorities as soon as possible. This way, you can immediately benefit from tax savings on your next purchase and effectively reduce procurement costs! Should you have any further questions, feel free to contact us. We wish you continued success and look forward to providing even better service.

comments.text: So where/ when should we submit the resale license?

Hi, Smart, To submit your documents for tax exemption, please send your relevant materials to xTool's official email: support@info.xtool.com. They will process your registration. Once your identity is verified, we will not charge you any tax on PledgeBox moving forward.

content.title: Beta Testers' Feedback Revealed & 6-Day Countdown for Printer Solo Super Early Bird!
content.creator:
xTool
March 6, 2025
content.content:
Dear Backers,
Please be aware that our Super Early Bird Standalone Bundle will officially close on March 11th. This is your last chance to secure the xTool Apparel Printer solo at the lowest price of $3,999. After the bundle closes, the price will increase by $500. If you're still on the fence, seize this final 6-day opportunity to take advantage of this best offer.
    Beta Testers' Reviews Are In
We know you're excited to see the xTool Apparel Printer in action! To give you a better idea, we've collected real-world feedback from our beta testers:
    Printer self-maintenance is real‚Äîit's never been this effortless!
@Kurtis: "How I clean it? I have let mine sit for an entire week and not printed anything All I did was hit the head cleaning three times and started printing..."
Click to watch the full video
    Does the one click feature really work as described?
@Kurtis: "I am thoroughly impressed with the one click print feature when combined with the Shaker oven, as it allowed me to simply hit print and within a few minutes I was able to start pressing them on the t-shirts..."
Click to watch the demo video
  Batch printing can also be done with just one click. @Michele shared an accelerated video of the batch printing and baking processÔºö
Click to watch the full video
    More Exciting Features to Explore
@Karina unveils her top 10 favorite features, showcasing the machine's versatility.
  @Todd provides an in-depth look at print differences across various DPI settings. Click to learn more
  Comprehensive Close Look at the Real Machine
@Todd also recorded a comprehensive video introducing the machine's appearance and the entire printing and baking process:
    We're incredibly grateful for our beta testers' invaluable feedback ‚Äì it's truly shaping the xTool Apparel Printer for an efficient and smooth user experience!
Eager to see more? Join our community! It's the perfect place to connect with fellow backers and stay updated on our progress.
Free Gifts Await at $4M Stretch Goal! Help Us Reach It!
We've already reached $3M in sales and are close to unlocking the $4M stretch goal. Share the campaign and help us reach the goal to win a free 100-meter film roll, 1 kg of baking powder, and a Printer cleaning kit!
  Thank you for your support,
The xTool Team

Great news! If you have a registered business, your pledge for the xTool Apparel Printer may qualify for VAT (Value Added Tax) exemption, potentially saving you up to 27%!

Kickstarter order screenshot
Business license/proof
Registered company name
VAT ID
Country
Our team will guide you through the quick verification process.
  Questions?

comments.text: is this just for EU customers or USA as well?
Mand√© un email a support y a Vicky pero no obtuve respuesta. Es ese el proceso correcto?
Hi Patricia, I‚Äôve already reminded the support team to respond to your email as soon as possible. Please be patient while you wait
How do we get the tax break

Dear Freeman, The amount you pledged does not include taxes. Taxes will be applied after you‚Äôve made your payment on Kickstarter, and when we are preparing to ship your product, they will be collected through Pledgebox. If you submit the required information to xTool's support in advance, we won‚Äôt charge you taxes through Pledgebox later.

comments.text: I am excited to get this apparel printer. I love the fact that I don't have to apply the powder myself and risk getting in my lungs. Thanks xTool for another great product.
I would like to see at least a year of printheads warranty with the hit of the 4 million.

I am really excited about the xTool Apparel Printer and was looking forward to receiving it. However, after reviewing the additional costs, I realized that the VAT and import taxes for the Netherlands are too high, making it difficult for me to afford the total amount. Unfortunately, due to these extra costs, Im thinking about it to cancel my pledge. I truly hope that in the future, you will be able to offer shipping from a European store or warehouse, which would make it much more accessible for customers like me

content.title: 2.5 Million Stretch Goal Release, Get High-Quality Skin-Safe Ink & Film Roll!
content.creator:
xTool
February 22, 2025
content.content:
Hi Backers,
  Your incredible support has propelled the xTool Apparel Printer to new heights, and we're thrilled to unveil our first stretch goal at the $2.5 million milestone‚Äîa CMYKW ink set (five bottles, 500ml each) and 25 meters of film roll for every backer! 
Our ink uses high-quality Japanese imported resin, enhancing ink flow and reducing printhead clogging, thereby extending the lifespan of the printhead. Additionally, it improves the stretchability of printed patterns on fabrics, making your apparel durable and long-lasting. 
  Moreover, our ink and film are OEKO-TEX certified, meeting ecological and health standards. This means they are safe for people and the environment, and have no harmful effects for direct skin contact.
Curious about the exciting gifts awaiting us at the next stretch goal? Help us reach $2.5 million to uncover the surprise!
  Sincerely,
xTool Team

comments.text: Does this mean that you get 7 bottles in total if you paid the $50 deposit?

I just pledged my balance in full @$6339.00 for one of the better packages. Being new to Kick Starter, I do not know what a "Stretch Goal" is and does that mean I owe more money to receive the ink and paper?

Hi Josh, thank you for supporting us! A stretch goal is a traditional Kickstarter activity: If the campaign's total sales reach a specified target, all backers receive an additional gifts. Our first stretch goal target is $2.5 million. If we reach this target, each backer will receive five bottles of ink and 25 meters of film. You don't need to pay extra to get those gifts once the sales target is reached.
So now for backers due to reaching another goal they will get ink and roll of paper?
Yes, once we reach 2.5M, all backers who complete their final purchase will receive 25 meters of film and the corresponding ink
